game_description: In our game, you can shoot office items as much as you want to vent your pressure in work. This is an early version of the project, and more themes and gameplay will be added in the future. If you like this project, please leave your valuable suggestions in the comment section below.
review_1: This is a simple but well made archery game, the aiming works really well ( i found that it works best to pull towards your neck instead of face), i hope it gets more updates with more things to do.
